We go sword-fish regularly migrate through the Messina Strait and peculiar boats have evolved there to catch the migrating fish
the sword fish swim southwards in the spring and northwards in June
The old sword fishing boats had perhaps a ten-foot mast with a lookout atop four rowers and a harpoon are on the bowels
These are no longer seen as modern motor boats with immense lattice steel masts and bow sprits have taken their place
